modification.id: Mostrar forma de pagamento na listagem do pedido
modification.author: Jeann e-mail: jeann@surgimento.com.br twiter: @surgimento site: http://www.surgimento.com.br/

operation.search: $sql = "SELECT o.order_id, CONCAT(o.firstname, ' ', o.lastname) AS customer,(SELECT os.cor FROM " . DB_PREFIX . "order_status os WHERE os.order_status_id = o.order_status_id AND os.language_id = '" . (int)$this->config->get('config_language_id') . "') AS cor, (SELECT os.name FROM " . DB_PREFIX . "order_status os WHERE os.order_status_id = o.order_status_id AND os.language_id = '" . (int)$this->config->get('config_language_id') . "') AS status, o.total, o.currency_code, o.currency_value, o.date_added, o.date_modified FROM `" . DB_PREFIX . "order` o";
